reviews.review:
You will not regret buying this, SERIOUSLY, is really THAT good

but be sure to play the first one :)
i would for sure recommend this game but the Weetly guy is really annoying and not funny at all. Also he follows you all game

How do one start telling a long story? How do one begin a speach about something that impacted his or her life so much? 

I remember being a huge fan of first game long before this one even anounced. I remember us, the Portal community, waiting for it to release. I remember watching hilarious Aperture Science adverstments styled trailers as soon as they appear. I remember hype over leaked version, I was among thouthands desperatly trying to download that torrent. And I do remember that excitement when me, no, we finally got released game in our hands. How people in a first fev days when no guide, no walktrought existed, were cooperating trying to solve single player puzzles. Oh, how especially I remember that tricky one on the entrance of 1960s labs. So many people stucked on it but no hate for this speciefic puzzle could spoil excitement over game at whole. First run of this game will forever remain a little piece of my heart. But story didn't finished on it. I, again, remember how many people including me re-runned it in third person using console command, to have a completely different expirience. I remember my favorite ever youtuber, unfame guy with a small but dedicated auditory, played it and just how fun was it to watch him playing. The release of Portal 2 was a miracle.

Now, years has passed. So many changed in almost a decade! The politics, our lifes, mine in speciefic, the game industry. Everything is so much different from 2011 that back then we wouldn't believe it. I'm so much of a different person myself that it blows my mind just to look back on a way I passed last 9 years and how much circumstances on it changed me. But there allways something that doesn't change. And for me, it revealed to be a dedication to this game. Hell, just to think about it, I might call love for Portal series a part of core of my personality! 

Re-running it again nowtimes is a jorney. It's a journey to our past as gamers, as people, journey to our own feelings. It stands the test of time not only because of a timeless graphical style, but because of the impact it makes on a player's soul. And for me, Portal 2 will forever remain a journey worth comming back.
great game! my full childhood along with bo2. worth every penny
the game reputation should be enough of a hint, stop reading review, the game is obviously awesome
God DAMN THIS GAME IS GOOD
It has a hilarious story and comedy throughout.
Это просто пушечка, а не игра ) Рекомендую первую и вторую часть )
Just a pure classic, the Portal games will be remembered like Tetris, Pong, Pacman...

The original Portal is probably my favorite game ever, its quick wit, fun gameplay, and strong pace create possibly the closest the gaming medium has ever gotten to perfection. Even though I don't believe it surpassed the original, Portal 2 is still a masterpiece of game design and should be played by everyone and their mothers (considering the inclusion of a co-op campaign).
It's Portal. Duh its going to be good

It's a really fun and cool game to play with another person. Me and my long-distance boyfriend enjoy this a lot! We love the dialogue--the robot guide is amazingly sarcastic.Wish there were more levels!!
Хороший сюжет, отличная графика и физика (Не считая некоторых багов, конечно). Я считаю эту игру достойный продолжением первой части (Пасхалки топ)
Good, but i cant find Bee Mod. i want to make an actually good chamber.
Arkadaşların ile çok zevkli oluyor beyin yakıcı :D
Este é um dos meus jogos favoritos. Inclusive o considero como um raros casos em que a sequência supera o original.
simply one of the best games of all time with a fantastic ending. goes on for AGES!!! SO ......CLEVER!!!!!!!!!

This was a fun puzzle game, I enjoyed the story and especially the hilarious voice lines.  It even has a 2 player mode which is made for after you beat story so you know the mechanics of the game.  The 2 player is amazing and the only desire I have is that it was longer with the 2 player section.  Truly a great game, thank you.
Brain go big when i play

Jogo excelente em questão de jogabilidade, gráficos, história e puzzles difíceis/desafiadores.

Só posso apontar um defeito: chega num momento que você sente que o jogo não vai acabar nunca, com desafios difíceis e... repetitivos, infelizmente. Nessa hora, lá perto das últimas 2h de jogo, eu já não tinha mais vontade/ânimo de jogar, só queria terminar logo a história. Não tinha mais paciência e de tanto refazer os mesmos desafios me senti enjoada.

Veja bem, o problema não é a dificuldade, mas sim o fato de serem desafios repetitivos. E isso, é claro, depende da sua própria opinião.

Fantastic game
Great level design, amazing sound design, the story is also great.
Other than the singleplayer mode there's also a coop mode and you can play community chambers which is why this game never gets boring 
Probably my favorite game made by Valve
Great game had to get it for pc
The ending was amazing loved it. :D
It's hard to overstate my satisfaction.

Un must nella libreria di ogni videogiocatore.
Fantastico in single player, ed ancora più bella la coop.
everyone has a top 5 favourite games and if you've played this game then its in your top 5

Het blijft leuk met Portal 2. Uren speelplezier in de coop modus, maar ook uren speelplezier met de story line. Er wordt veel meer duidelijk over ie je bent, wie je in Portal 1 was en wat de geschiedenis van Aperture is. En de grote ondergrondse ruimtes zijn immens.
This is a very good game!
Очень классно сюжет 2 частей просто топ

[b]★★★★★

Exceeded my expectations, by a mile! A knockout sequel and a satirical showpiece![/b]

If you're coming straight from the first installment and loved it, Portal 2 will easily scream masterpiece to you. I don't know why it took me half a year before continuing the franchise but I'm just ecstatic that I finally completed both. Really clever writing, colorful characters, dynamic gameplay, well-tamed pacing, immersive soundtracks and some of the most incredible level designs ever in a game. If this ain't creative and imaginative, I don't know what is. The humor ride is bucketlist worthy! And with these epilogues again. lol So great! Too funny for words!

It's way worth its regular price but the bundle is almost always on sale so get it whenever! [i]For science, you monster![/i]
This is beyond anything i ever played. its not a game. its a experience
jeme bokou se jeu por i joue avek lé zamis sé fafement koule
游戏性很棒！那两个门常常可以玩出骚操作

Mal ganz ehrlich, menschenverachtende KI´s? Das kennt man Heute schon zur genüge... allerdings mit diesem überaus gelungenen Sarkasmus welcher in Portal 2 sogar noch besser ist als im Vorgänger, wurde hier eine ganz neue Idee umgesetzt.

Singleplayer:
Das Turtorial ist sehr gut ins Spiel integriert und fällt nicht wirklich auf. Die Level werden von mal zu mal schwerer. hier ist nicht nur ein gutes Auge sondern auch immer mehr Geschick und Timing gefragt. Die Story ist wunderbar ausgearbeitet mit einigen Wendungen und sehr viel schwarzem Humor

Multiplayer:
Dieser Modus ist neu und sorgt für ordentlich Spass und Kurzweile. Es gibt zwei Arten des Multiplayers (Standart-Koop und Challenge-Koop)

Zusätzlich enthält das Spiel einen wunderbar einfachen Editor der sich selbst erklärt im grosen und ganzen. Auch nach dem Veröffentlichen einer Karte kann diese noch bearbeitet werden.

Fazit:
Selten hat mich ein Spiel so unterhalten auf so vielen Ebenen. Definitiv eine Empfehlung. Aber Vorsicht: das Spiel macht süchtig ;)
Eu gostei. Me deu enjoo e ânsia de vômito as vezes, mas é normal. É igual ser pai.
One of the best games ever made.
No! You can't just ignore my puzzles and go straight to the end!                                          Haha portal go woosh
You've all seen half life: Alyx, but you would never believe me if I told you valve was making a "portal: chell" now would you?

Excelente jogo! Ótimos puzzles com uma história surpreendente e engraçada
(Isso que nem joguei o Co-op ainda)
This game is so well done and i cant get enough of it!

Я лично говоря рекомендую эту сыграть с друзьями (почему ?) потому что там можно нехило повеселится 
Valve нехило потрудились и я ставлю твёрдую 10 
Там по возможности можно как-то умудрится найти баг но это не точно 
В одиночном прохождение или по понятнее компания есть юмор так что ставлю твёрдый ё0 (из-за юмора)
А так игра клёво рекомендую тем людям кто любит головоломку и ещё + историю 
Оценка от этой игры 10/10 (я сам лично решил какую оценку поставить так что не судите строго)
 Рекомендую к покупке!!!!!!!!
Суперская игра . Конец прям тронул . Желаю всем пройти и первую и вторую часть зря время не пройдёт.

Портал - это шедевр!! Жаль, что продолжения не будет.
 Так или иначе, это, на мой взгляд, лучшая игра от 1-ого лица. И ГЛэДОС тролит фразами, и в кооператив играть весело (Канал "Глюк" это доказывает) и самому карты создавать можно (кто-то умудряется каким-то образом за рамки заходить и делает гонки, халф-лаив в портале и т.п.). 
Если знаете, как это делать, расскажите.
